ddi:stdyInfo.ddi:abstract:
Data derived from weekly public opinion polls in the Netherlands in 1984 concerning social and political issues. Samples were drawn from the Dutch population aged 18 years and older.
All data from the surveys held between 1962 and 2000 are available in the DANS data collections.
Background variables: Sex / age / religion / income / vote recall latest elections / party preference / level of education / union membership / professional status / < self > left-right rating / party alignment / province / degree of urbanization / weight factor.

Den Uyl / Income expectations. n8404: Number of foreign children and Dutch children in school class of responder's children / Positive discrimination of foreigners / Understanding for people who gave
